title: East India Cotton association Prices -September 16 2019
text:
East India Cotton association Prices -September 16 2019

Commodities 2 hours ago (Sep 17, 2019 02:01)

East India Cotton association Prices -September 16 2019 BANGALORE, September 16 (Reuters) - The following are the daily Cotton prices supplied by Indian based East India Cotton Association. The prices are in Indian Rupees per Candy (355.62 Kgs).
